item.title: Network / ToolingSniffing established BLE connections with HackRF OneMon 01 September 2025Tracking already-established BLE connections using SDR has its own challenges. With custom firmware and multi-channel listening, the presented approach quickly deduces the hidden hopping parameters needed to follow the connection.Read more

item.title: CTIAnalysis of Secp0 RansomwareTue 15 July 2025The article analyzes the Secp0 ransomware, which emerged in early 2025 and operates as conventional double-extortion ransomware, encrypting data while threatening public disclosure, targeting Linux systems.Read more

item.title: CTIWorld Leaks: An Extortion PlatformTue 20 May 2025This article provides an analysis of World Leaks, a new extortion platform that emerged in early 2025, detailing its origins, operational challenges, and collaborations with other threat actors.Read more
